name: Zpeed-Wrapping
description:
A point and click real-time strategy game where you need to give what the customer wants. The setting is christmas and the customers wants their gifts wrapped. Be sure to give the gift they want and the order they want it to be wrapped.

Instructions

* Click one of the gender signs to choose whether if it's a gun they want or a doll

* Click the icons above the wrappers to wrap the gift

* Click the trash icon to throw the gift away and restart again. Use this if you ever made a mistake in wrapping order. You can't undo what you've done.

* Drag the gifts to the people to give it to them

Levels

Easy - ladies only

Faster Respawn - Ladies + men, respawns faster

Impatient - kids = boys + girls, kids have short patience

Crazy Mode - Ladies + men + boys + girls, Instant wraps no time required

Insanity - Ladies + men + boys + girls, asking you to wrap a wrapped box ain't that insane?

Controls

* mouse -> left click button

Info

This was made for my 1st Christmas challenge to myself.

rules for this challenge:

    • Start = December 25
    • Complete the game before January 1
    • Theme: Gift

I completed the game by the way.

Watch the process here: [link later once editing is finished]
